resources.string: Welcome to Movable Typer! This application allows you to try the Motion Input Keyboard. When selected, a ball appears which indicates the direction in which the device\'s motion has been recognized (based on the sensitivity level set in the settings). To get the tired emoji, shake the device to the left or the right (which will make the ball bounce from left to right). To get the laughing emoji, move the device up or down (which will make the ball bounce up and down). To get the thinking emoji, change the device\'s position (move the whole device forward, backward, upward or downward, which will make the ball perform a pulse animation). The picked up motion will reflect on the ball\'s movement and a feedback vibration. The sensitivity can be set by pushing the "Settings" button (default is 25 m/s^2). Try it out below (remember to set your keyboard to Motion Input)
